tour.title: PALAD SANDBAR
tour.details: LOCATION: SANTA CRUZ MARINDUQUE, MANIWAYA ISLAND. NOTE: BEFORE you arrive, check the tide because it disintegrates when it is high.
tour.author: Jay Marc Rioveros

tour.title: KAWAKAWA FALLS
tour.details: The Kawa-kawa Falls is located at Barangay Bangcuangan, Santa Cruz, Marinduque. It is called ‚ÄúKawa-kawa‚Äù because of its natural formation is shape like a big frying fan. It has falls above it with clear waters flowing down the kawa with 15 feet deep. it has a diameter of round 10 meters and surrounded by ‚ÄúDalipe‚Äù or solid rocks.
tour.author: Dagway üì∑
